website_summaries.verdict: The waterproof cover offers enough room for larger bikes with saddle bags and accessories, to protect your full ride.
pros: Pack down your cover into the supplied pull string bag for when you're on the move
Made from a durable waterproof material and built to last
Luggage strap keeps your cover secure in high winds, and waterproof material offers excellent protection from weather
Reinforced elastic hem helps keep the cover taught to your bike, includes lock holes too
Cover is heat-rated at 150-degrees to prevent melting if applied to hot engine
cons: This cover fades in color quickly

customer_reviews.title: Best motorcycle cover
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd Nuzari motorcycle cover I have purchased. I do not have a garage so my 3 motorcycles are outside in the New Mexico elements, mainly sun, heat, wind and rain. The most protective Nuzari cover is only a few bucks more than their lower end cover and is definitely worth it. The covers do fade with the elements but they protect the bikes. This is the only MC cover I will buy. Excellent quality. Very good value. Seller is very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Souljacker777

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Yamaha Majesty with 55” tall windshield
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover in the red color (BOOMER SOONER!) for a Yamaha Majesty scooter in the large size. My windshield is 55” tall. It is a perfect fit and appears to be well designed and made. Just purchased, so I cannot comment on durability. I will update in a few months after a hot Oklahoma summer has worked it over. At the risk of recycling an overused phrase, shipping WAS super fast. I highly recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: recon

customer_reviews.title: Bargain cover !
customer_reviews.text: Guys here's a great fitting nice cover for under a hundred dollar's! ! A+A+A+ I used their size chart and got a perfect fitting bike cover for my Harley! ! I've always been cheap on covers owned at least a half dozen. But I wanted to get some quality for the Harley without breaking the bank ! Bingo Nuzari, best price out there hands down kudos !🤓 ps, I ordered 1 size too big hence the baggy fit ! Just wanted more room for my bags ect..
customer_reviews.author: CHAching

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this for the price & quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I have a bike being stored outside at present and this cover protects it from all the elements. Clipping fasteners and elastic bottom keep it from "ballooning" or blowing off. Completely water proof. Highly reflective-- when headlights shine on it, it looks like a giant glowing motorcycle. Easy to put on, easy to remove, easy to fold, store and travel. Fits in my saddlebag so easy to bring on long rides in case of inclement weather. Couldn't be more pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: SJM BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Loving this cover - good gauge material, reflective stripes assure you the bike outline can be seen from a 100ft with headlights - strap that goes under is brilliant as are the slots at the edges of the front and rear wheels to run your chain lock through (prevents softie from stealing it) - Keeps the dust off and keeps it dry - hope it holds up as others say through the winter... Went with the medium for my Suzuki gsxr 600 - looks like it would fit any Supersport or Superbike (without extended trail arms and without luggage)
customer_reviews.author: 2loki4u

customer_reviews.title: Great Motorcycle Cover
customer_reviews.text: It went perfectly over my 2006 Harley Davidson Ultra Glide Classic with no problem and room to breathe. I love this cover good quality and it allowed me to lock it to the bike unlike my other cover that was stolen. Would definitely recommend this product. The wind is not a problem as the cover allows the air to escape. Another great feature is the heat shield on the inside for the pipes.
customer_reviews.author: Biggie

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a Beast!
customer_reviews.text: Far heftier than the last couple covers, in a good way. From the weight of the material, to design, fit, and finish, this is a superior product. Fits my F800 with full bags like a glove - More so than a couple other so called XL covers. Interior is soft, and tied own options are perfect. Well worth your hard earned dough.
customer_reviews.author: UrbanMoniqueTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical of this product at first buying a unfamiliar brand online. But after reading the reviews and looking at the fitment. I decided to go ahead and give Nuzari a shot. And on my 2012 Yamaha Raider it fits like a glove. And I've already experienced high wind and rain in the past few weeks. My bike was dry the next morning and as i was watching the cover in high wind being outside it never ballooned up like my other cover would. Hands down this cover does what they say it will do. Great product guys keep up the great work. I will gladly purchase from y'all again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Material
customer_reviews.text: The material is thick and appears to be built to last. At least in the short term it has performed as advertised to keep water out and dryness in. The sizes are just a tad smaller than I am used to from other manufacturers but it wasn't a problem fitting on my wife's bike or my own. My only nit was that the colors I really wanted were not available and I simply did not want to wait to get new covers on my bike.
customer_reviews.author: José J. Amador, Phd

customer_reviews.title: Really Good, if it lasts...Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cover. If it lasts a fair amount of time....I will love this cover. More elastic fromt and back to really pull the cover under the wheels. I was also happy for the strap under the chassis, came in handy during high winds the other night. Got this for a great price, if it lasts longer than my previous, it is a great value. 2014 Harley Street Glide Special Bought XXL cover
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo happy I ordered this cover
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo happy I ordered this cover!!! Product and shipping was just as/if not better than written. I feel very confident in purchasing from them again and recommending them to my friends and family. Daniel is very professional and follows up w/customers even when not asked to. He checks if product was rcv'd on time and if I had any questions or concerns. He goes above and beyond what he has to - IMHO I'll be a customer for life! Picture below is what I'm using it on/for (1993 Gold Wing Aspencade 1500),wish I had a pic with it covering it, looks awesome and the night vision (side striping/front...) illumination is gr8 !!! Tim K. Leland, NC
customer_reviews.author: Tim Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Adventure bikes need one size larger.
customer_reviews.text: I've had several cover's for my motorcycle's, this one is almost the perfect cover. Very well made, with thoughtful touches like small openings for the fork sliders and swingarm. It's made of heavy duty material and really is water proof. If it had a rear strap I would call it perfect, but that's really just being picky; it stays on perfectly fine just the way it is. If you buy one I don't think you'll be disappointed, I'm not. One cavet, if you own an adventure bike, order one size larger; fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: thezzr

customer_reviews.title: It’s big, and it faded, but it WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: It works! Keeps the rain off of my bike, it’s too big, but it has tie downs and a belly strap so it’s ok. I don’t have a garage, so I depend on this to keep my bike dry. The green has faded out, but as long as it keeps the rain off, I’m ok with it being faded. I would buy it again. But a smaller size. I bought the XXL, I have a Vulcan Vaquero. Probably should have just bought the XL, the XXL would probably fit the big bikes with a top case easy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bodine

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and great cover!
customer_reviews.text: I have to keep my bike outdoors year round and I am so glad I got this cover. Fully waterproof (I can just see the water bead up on it) and sinches very well along the bottom of the tires. Perfect fit for my 03 Suzuki SV 650S. Reflective piping is a great touch so people can see the bike in my apartment complex parking lot. Would recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: cjkasian1

customer_reviews.title: Well done !!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cover . Well designed and very well made . Perfect fit on my bike . Great customer service . Well done folks !!! I am so far absolutely very pleased with this product . It is currently raining quite hard in my area an it is covering my bike as it is expected to rain for several days . When it stops I will have a much better idea of its performance . Also I will see how well it holds up in the coming Texas summer heat but... I have faith that it will fare well . I guess as they say , The Proof Is In The Pudding .
customer_reviews.author: Racspur1

customer_reviews.title: Well made cover
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this cover. I ride a BMW K1600 GT. I got the XL version of the cover. At first, it seemed too big but once it was on the bike I appreciate the size. It is definitely waterproof. We have had to inundating rain and the bike has stayed dry. The only problem I've had is my own fault. I connected the bottom strap before the bike was complete cooled down and it melted the strap. Regardless, I'm happy with this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T. Craven

customer_reviews.title: Great cover at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not exaggerating, this is a sturdy well built cover. I own an FJR1300 and the side bags take up some serious girth. This handles the task with ease and still has enough to cover the bike completely to the ground. My other bike, an FZ-09, is covered with a more expensive Nelson-Rigg and although it too is sturdy, it doesn't cover the bike as nicely as the Nuzari. It certainly WILL be when I need a new one. I absolutely recommend getting a Nuzari if you value and care for your ride.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H. H.F., N.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for the price, and the XL-XXL even fits a sidecar bike
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these covers, and already wrote a review, but this past weekend I had a pleasant surprise - the XL cover that I bought for a Kawasaki KLR650 actually fits my Chang Jiang sidecar outfit. It doesn't reach to the ground all around, but close...so the XXL cover offered here would likely do the trick. Great covers for the price!
customer_reviews.author: CamperD

customer_reviews.title: Best cover I've had
customer_reviews.text: I got the small one for my 99 Honda Magna, it has the windscreen and saddlebags, thos cover just barely fits down the the rims. The fabric is sturdy so the wind won't tear it up. And the waterproofing is very nice. It keeps the dust and other stuff off and the strap that goes around the bottom (middle) is very secure. Overall for the price I am very very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: 3colt3

customer_reviews.title: Yup, it's waterproof
customer_reviews.text: In the Pacific Northwest it rains - even in summertime. So I covered my bike, just in case that 40% chance of showers on the 4th of July came to fruition. This morning there was a small pool of water gathered on top of the cover - but not inside or under the cover. My baby is dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality-glad I found it
customer_reviews.text: I bought one cover (large) for my Harley 1200 Custom Sportster. It is more than ample in size. I bought larger than I needed so I wouldnt have to struggle with it. It has enough elastic in it that I still snugly fits around the bike, covering it completely. Ive had this cover for a few months. No fading (red) of the color in direct sunlight and it keeps the bike perfectly dry. In fact, I liked it so much, that when I purchased another bike, I bought another one. I now have two and they are exceptional quality. You cant go wrong with this cover. The same size also fits my Softail Deluxe.
customer_reviews.author: TTC0118

customer_reviews.title: Worked great but I found a tear where the stitching meets
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for about a month now. Worked great but I found a tear where the stitching meets. I'm pretty sure this was not my fault as I do not jam the cover on hard and have not had any 'snags'. I have another nuzari cover I'm using now that works great. Maybe this one was just defective. I would buy them again. Hopefully can return this one. Edit: customer service is great. Will send a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Durable Cover
customer_reviews.text: Got the medium size for my 2018 Triumph Bonneville Speedmaster. It has low and wide mirrors/handlebars. This cover fits very nicely, all the way to the bottom of the tires. The elastic around the bottom really helps to snug it up, but not to the point where it's difficult to get on or off. The material seems thick and durable, and I can actually fit the cover back into the bag after rolling it up. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: W3rd F3rguson

customer_reviews.title: Durable and awesome cover!
customer_reviews.text: Since I've received my Nuzari motorcycle cover, I've been absolutely satisfied with it. It provides fantastic protection and coverage for motorcycle in various conditions. Throughout the past weeks it has rainedin the Oakland, CA and the cover has done a great job of keeping my bike dry from the elements. The material seems very durable which has led me to the decision of purchasing another cover and recommending it to my fellow motorcyclists.
customer_reviews.author: paul ubongen

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality cover for my 2002 Mean Streak
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cover, material seems quite high quality, I just got it so time will tell, but I am initially impressed! For sizing reference, I bought the large to cover my 2002 Mean Streak (with stock mirrors and no windshield); at first I thought this was a touch too big, but realized it does snug up nicely with the full elastic along the bottom opening, and the adjustable strap and quick release clip is centered in the middle under the bike, pulling the cover together securely so it's fine... and a nice aspect is it covers down so completely the lower wheel rims aren't exposed either!
customer_reviews.author: Marty Moose

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing many different covers that would fit my 19 heritage, I finally purchased this product which was the right decision (finally) I waited a while to write a review on this because I owned Several covers in the past and each on ended breaking and ripping apart. I like this because it not cheaply made, it’s durability and resistance against heavy wind & rain & snow lives up to my expectation. Yes it’s a bit expensive but I believe this would last more than winter.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Seemed good but turned out to be garbage
customer_reviews.text: Had the cover for less than a week and stitching is already torn and a baseball-sized hole has appeared. Also (don't really care but should note) that the dark blue color as already started fading to a light pinkish color from sun exposure. When I received the cover the quality seemed great and I was overall happy but after only a week for these flaws to arise is unacceptable. Issuing a Return and buying elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: This cover is the all around best I've seen in years
customer_reviews.text: This cover is the all around best I've seen in years. This item is described and listed very well. I have a 2009 streetglide and this cover is the way to go. Fits my bike and covers it well. The vent holes are great, nice and snug with full coverage!!! Seriously, don't go for the 20 dollar cheapo's. This is the all around weather cover one needs and wants. I would buy another one and recommend this one too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Casandra

customer_reviews.title: Very good cover for the money
customer_reviews.text: This cover has outlasted all of the other cheap ones I have bought for my bike. It has faded over the past year, but it has held up remarkably. There are no rips or tears in the material and the elastic stretch band at the bottom is still holding up. A durable cover that I would definitely purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Daniel Sipek

customer_reviews.title: Seam split open after only a few weeks...but the seller sent me a replacement very quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: I contacted Ondaupswing about the warranty. They responded within a day to ask for a bit more information and then sent me a replacement cover a couple of days after that. I am quite happy with their customer service. Original review: The good: The material is heavy and waterproof. The size chart was accurate, and the cover fits very well. The bad: I have had the cover for only about 6 weeks, but it already has a seam split open. I've contacted the seller about the warranty, and will update this review once I hear back from them.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Martin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Got a new motorcycle recently and the space I park it behind my gate has a tree. While that is great for shade, it also drops a little sap (not an extreme amount) so I needed a cover to keep the bike clean. I sized this one and the price was fair (more than the cheap $20 ones but less than the $100+ ones). It covers my bike just fine and is study. It was a little windy the other day and it stayed secure. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: It fits great as is
customer_reviews.text: This (size L) bag fits my 2017 Honda Africa Twin perfectly. It fits great as is, but allows room for when I travel with panniers. The reflective material is easily seen in the parking lot of my work, which I appreciate. The cover came in a backpack for easy storing and goes back into the backpack without much difficulty. I've only used it in the rain once, but my bike was perfectly dry. More importantly, it keeps the dust off my bike because the bottom of the cover is trimmed with elastic and creates a nice fit along the bottom of the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Buck

customer_reviews.title: ... few weeks ago and so far it has been great. out of the 2 weeks it has rained ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this cove a few weeks ago and so far it has been great. out of the 2 weeks it has rained half that time and from what i can tell it keeps the water out. there was a little bit of water puddled on top of my bike that i intentionally left and after a few days it was still there. Tells me that it keeps water out. I have a Honda CBR 600 and it fit over it perfectly. I will update after the summer months to see how well it holds up in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: JayP

customer_reviews.title: Great Motorcycle Cover
customer_reviews.text: Great quality cover. The large fit my Victory Hammer perfectly. It is perfect for the Texas conditions as the dust will often show on the vehicle the very next day after being washed. With the cover, its been weeks and the bike still looks clean. The clip is great at keeping the cover secured to the bike. Last week we had strong winds and heavy downpours and the cover did very well. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cover!
customer_reviews.text: Best cover I have owned so far when it comes to quality, fitment, and convenience. I ordered a size bigger than recommended on amazon to make sure it touches the ground. I have found with previous motorcycles and covers that if it doesn't touch the ground rain droplets splash the bottom of my bike and cause dirt blotches. Also, it works good if my bike is on its stands with the bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew John Close

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Placed on a Ducati Evo. Goes all the way to the bottom of both tires. Decent material. No leaks and doesn't seem to be scratching the bike. There's a strap on the bottom with a buckle to keep it from blowing off from the wind. There's also a couple holes in the front tire portion so you can put a lock and chain through. The reflective lines make it easy to spot in my back yard at night. There's also enough slack to place it over the bike with the helmet still attached to the bike.
customer_reviews.author: damaznblkman

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality sturdy and very nice cover! It is not only waterproof it really repels water, the droplets stay on the cover/ roll right off. It is really roomy and has a clip that you can close underneath the bike and tighten as needed, and you can pull a cord through it down at the wheels if necessary. It also has reflective stripes on the cover so people will see the bike at night.
customer_reviews.author: EuropeanCaliGRL

customer_reviews.title: The size also seems a bit bigger - and as she says - bigger is better!; ) All in all after a month ...
customer_reviews.text: Made a change from Nelson-Rigg covers of which I have had several of and have worked and lasted for years. Tried this one out for a color change and this compares just as well with N-R top of the line covers. There are actually a few things on this I prefer such as the reflective striping which I thought was a gimmick but actually works well and hopefully will keep my scoot from getting hit. The size also seems a bit bigger - and as she says - bigger is better! ;) All in all after a month - great stuff - the test is 5 years later if it still can hang with my other N-R covers. Mahalo!
customer_reviews.author: hwnwhaler

customer_reviews.title: No good size for my bike.
customer_reviews.text: Cant say much about the quality yet as I just got the cover. Seems ok but will update after a couple months in Florida weather. My problem- I have a Harley Sportster with half apes. The medium does not accommodate the bars and does therefore not cover the whole bike. The large is WAY too big and I prefer a more snug fit. The part inside the cover that would touch the hot pipe is rendered useless and I will have to wait for the bike to completely cool before putting it on. I like that the name helps you determine right away which part is the front. One pic is the medium and the other a large.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki513

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Great so far, I had bought a previous one for 20 dollars here on Amazon and within 2 weeks it was falling apart. This one has given me no problems, the material is great quality, for the price definitely worth it. I got a medium for a 2018 honda rebel. Update: lasted about a year and a half. It's gone through rain, heat, and wind while always kept outside. Buckle was still intact however stitching opened up and the fabric was ripped open.
customer_reviews.author: -A

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and heavy!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality cover. Thick material with good details on the stitching. Includes adjustable straps in the bottom center area which allows you to strap the cover to the bike. It also includes open slots on the from tire to attach a safety lock for added security. This is my second cover the previous one was another brand and didn’t last.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a Suzuki C90T 1500cc Touring bike. The cover I had before was sized at Extra large which draped over the bike in excess, it lasted just about 7 years. I purchased the large on the Nuzari. Very pleased with the fit, no draping on the ground. I like the center strapping, the way the cover hugs the front and rear wheels is really good. Not sure if will need a strap for the front. The wind does not seem to blow it loose. The material seems really durable. Good product with a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good motorcycle cover
customer_reviews.text: These are very good covers. I purchased 2 a medium and large, medium for my fiance's ninja 300 and a large for my v-rod. The material is really good and has a heat shield inside where the pipes are so you don't burn a hole through it with hot pipes. Medium covers the ninja 300 but not all the rear tire, about 1/4 of the bottom of tire maybe less isn't covered. I purchased just to have a high quality indoor cover due to garage also being a woodshop. The large covered the v-rod with room to spare. It's a night rod special v-rod for sizing reference.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away by this cover. I have had it for about 2 weeks now and it continues to impress me. I have a 2006 Yamaha Vstar 650 with a windshield and saddle bags. The large size covers it all the way to the ground. The reflective stripes are a great touch too. The material is very durable and the vents allow air to move so you won't get a parachute effect. Do not make the mistake I made and buy a $12 "waterproof" cover from ebay because those are not waterproof (pretty much just a dust cover).
customer_reviews.author: Arbiterfox

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but OK
customer_reviews.text: So if you like receiving emails begging for review. Then this is the product for you. I have been using this now for 3 months or more. It has stood up to the weather nicely. But the sun is another matter. It has faded and it is getting stiff. This is bad as it means the fabric maybe breaking down. When it was new it was great now it is just OK. The last cover I had lasted two years. I would recommend that you look at others. This is thin works well but not sure about longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Layton

customer_reviews.title: Caused more then 1500 in damage.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because of the description of “the air vents that would allow air to pass through which will prevent the ballon effect that normally knocks down motorcycles.” Well I guess the one I got did not do it’s job. Used on my new motorcycle. Put about 30 miles on it. Covered it. Got call at work saying wind knocked bike over and it is laying over in parking lot. Now have to take to the shop for more then $1500 in damage due to wind getting in to cover and knocking it over. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Robby Rob

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: Every year we have to buy a cover for my husband's Harley. We live in WNY where the winter can be harsh and windy. This cover has held up FANTASTIC! It fit his cruiser PERFECTLY and is by far the most durable cover we have found.
customer_reviews.author: faeryfriendz

customer_reviews.title: NUZARI ROCKS AMAZON RULES
customer_reviews.text: I finally purchased a cover after ordering so many that would not hold water. This NUZARI cover meets all expectations!!!! days of heavy hard rain and my scooter did not have one drop of rain<>wow Amazon Prime< great product great price >Thank You Amazon and congrats NUZARI for your bike covers and honesty from both professionals. Amazon Rocks#1 S. Mark Stacy Friday June 14, 2017 5:00am Godsend to All..
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover for a Piaggio MP3!
customer_reviews.text: As advised by the seller, the medium cover fit my 2010 Piaggio MP3 very well. It looks & feels like a very high quality, well made product. After several days of rain, including a couple of heavy downpours, the bike was nearly dry when I uncovered it. There was very little moisture under the cover & what was present was almost certainly condensation from the high humidity. I am very happy with my purchase & would certainly recommend it to any others looking for a motorcycle cover.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cover is HUGE
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I expected. I’m using it to cover a 17 Indian Roadmaster and have a ridiculous amount of room to spare. Waterproofing is good so far. Just wish it had bungee hooks to make the cover a bit more snug.
customer_reviews.author: pbgreat1

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Ninja ex400 Ninja !!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be too big for my Ninja ex400 but it fits it, a bit baggy on some spots but it does the job. During windy days (Hawaii Weather), it doesn't flap around too much and give it being in the sun 24/7 in Hawaii weather, it keeps my motorcycle cooled. I love the reflective lines on it and the strap on the bottom. Dew in the morning doesnt seep through during the mornings and I love that. During rainy days, its holds up great! It does seep through nor does soak anything under. Id say. Quality wise, it does the job. Bang for you buck in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: AlohaDawn

customer_reviews.title: Very good cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: Seems to help keep the elements off the bike. Straps leave much to be desired. It’s just okay and for the price it has some good value. Had rain a few days and this did well to keep the water off while also allowing the bike to breathe thanks to the ventilation slits. Not a bad cover and for the price it’s four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Irad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product; easily put on
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product; easily put on, taken off, folded, and placed in stuff-sack. As an "old" back packer, used to folding tents and such, I found that this product met all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Elmo

customer_reviews.title: Great cover that can product your bike in rain
customer_reviews.text: I love this motorcycle cover! It reflects at night, and it seems really heavy duty and made with good material. It survived a storm and kept my bike as dry as it could (I'm typically too lazy to put the cover all the way around, so only the bottom got wet) and it didn't leak at all. So far, I'm very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: ken law

customer_reviews.title: Best cover I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. This conver worked out great for me when I go to work. I don't have to worry about my bike getting Sun damage,dirty or the seat to be wet when it's time to go home after a rainy day. I have a 2008 hayabusa with an 6" strectch. In glad I didn't get a large because the Medium fits perfectly. Good quality. Most people think I must have paid a lot for this.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: The material is high quality and looks like it will last
customer_reviews.text: The material is high quality and looks like it will last. It's been in service for only a month so I'll update this later if there are any issues. The elastic around the bottom holds the cover on very nicely. There's also a plastic buckle that runs under the bottom of the bike for extra security, though I haven't needed it. It's been through sun and rain and has kept the bike well protected. Update: Starting last summer, the fabric started to tear in spots. It lasted just over 2 years in the brutal TX heat. Not too bad, though I hoped it would last longer. I'll try a lower priced cover from another manufacturer to see how it compares.
customer_reviews.author: smoove

customer_reviews.title: Decent cover
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice big cover with an elastic bottom. I was expecting the inside of the cover to be a softer material but its the same both outside and inside. I wanted the inside portion which touches my bike to be more like a microfiber so I was disappointed that it was just the same tarp texture. Nonetheless it is covering my bike in my garage and preventing dust and crap from accumulating over the winter. Im not sure you get a lot more with this product than the cheaper covers on Amazon but Im not returning it.
customer_reviews.author: John F

customer_reviews.title: Nuzari Motorcycle Cover
customer_reviews.text: I have had this cover over a year now and other than the usual fading our hot summer days this one has held up a lot better than ones I have owned before. So far no rips so I would definitely recommend people trying this one out.
customer_reviews.author: ChatKat

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: I had to leave my motorcycle outside this winter. This cover has been great so far except for the tie ripping off in 88mph winds (found the cover a couple houses down). I would say the cover is fine and the winds are at fault! Hopefully no more wind storms like that. I bought a little larger than I thought would fit because I have an old Kawasaki 1100 with the cargo boxes and full faring so it is kinda large. I'm happy with the fit, the durability in the sun and rain and snow so far.....Great purchase. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Terry581

customer_reviews.title: Camo Fades hard after one month of sun exposure.
customer_reviews.text: Cover is good quality. But don't order the camouflage. I couldn't decide whether I wanted camouflage or black. I went with the camo and after 1 month, half of it is completely faded where the sun hits it directly. almost like a fall camouflage pattern. at present I'm trying to get the other side to fade but this isn't what I wanted. I didn't want fall camouflage in red/orange. Not happy about that. Otherwise it's a good
customer_reviews.author: Crescenzo L.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so amazing. I purchased it and the third day i had it we had the worst storm and my bike was stuck outside with it and I was really amazed on how well it handled the weather. It looks and feels like it is made to last. The design is brilliant!!!!! I hope to purchase more products from you in the future. It is very rare you find actual quality any more and you guys braught quality to another level!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: patrico

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The camo is completely faded after 2 weeks, very cheaply made and kinda disappointed. I would not trust this in the winter time with my bike. Its okay to keep rain off but seems to leak in a few spots. Just disappointed all the way around. Should have got something different. :(
customer_reviews.author: S.R Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Works well, covers my bike with tall screen, engine guards and barkbusters. High quality, heavy duty materials, reinforced seams, reflective piping, elastics, and webbings strap. Rey waterproof so far. Would definitely recommend to adv riders. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Laughin’ Hyaena

customer_reviews.title: A truly high quality cover for reasonable cost...
customer_reviews.text: I have been a biker for over 55 years and I have owned/used many different types of motorcycle covers made from varied kinds of materials. This includes very expensive Harley Davidson covers and this bike cover is just as good (if not better) quality as any that I have used in past days...except that this price is more reasonable by far. I will buy more of these covers and I have recommended them to friends.
customer_reviews.author: bikeryakman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Cover seems well made
customer_reviews.text: Last cover for my 2014 VStar 1300 shed white stuff all over it. This one IS plenty heavy, well made, and fit perfectly! I like that it's bright red -- easy to see (my bike lives in a driveway). Pay careful attention to instructions that say do not wash, and don't put on when your pipes are hot!
customer_reviews.author: Robynn Brannen

customer_reviews.title: Great cover and nice features
customer_reviews.text: They were very helpful in making sure I got the right size for my bike. Fits nicely and snug all the way to the ground covers the whole tire. Nice looking in black cover and the reflective lines are a nice touch too. Feels like the cover will last a few years too. Had it covered when it rained and it does well keeping it dry. I'll see how it goes in Jersey winter lol. Overall a nice cover for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jerseybiker856

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Cover for my Honda Rebel
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cover; covers my Rebel 500 with room to spare. It is very durable, has a great look, hugs the bike contour and is very protective. I keep my bikes garaged but would not hesitate to take this with me on a trip to protect my bike against the elements
customer_reviews.author: pence777

customer_reviews.title: ... put it on my Honda st1300 and it fits pretty good a little long but a well made cover ...
customer_reviews.text: Just put it on my Honda st1300 and it fits pretty good a little long but a well made cover and I like the strap under the cover and the grommet holes to run the front wheel lock through so it is not easy to steel I would recommend this cover it is one of the better ones that I have purchased
customer_reviews.author: Double D

customer_reviews.title: We have received the cover and love it. It fits great and is perfect for ...
customer_reviews.text: We have received the cover and love it. It fits great and is perfect for the tough UV rays in AZ. I really appreciate the strap that secures the cover underneath the bike. The wind can be pretty rough and the cover has stayed put during it all. It fits my HD 883L very well. I am happy with the construction. I wish they made these covers for RZR's!
customer_reviews.author: Marty Warner

customer_reviews.title: Great cover!
customer_reviews.text: Great cover and water resistance and durability are good. I got a medium for my 2018 gsxr 750 and it fits fine but it's not the tightest fit. I've had my bike out with the cover against a storm and it has protected it pretty well. I've had the cover for a few months and it's still holding up well in the spring/ summer with alot of rain hitting it and hot weather. I'm impressed and I like the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2003 Harley Heritage Softail. I bought a different cover for a little less money elsewhere, that stated it fit my bike. Not only was it cheaply made, it didn't fit my bike at all. However, after returning it and ordering THIS cover I can tell you that not only is the quality excellent, but it fits my bike with the rear seat attached and saddle bags installed!!! Buy this cover, stop looking.
customer_reviews.author: mpier

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Outdoor MC Cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is well made of heavy material. It has been through several thunderstorms with high winds and drenching rain. It kept my bike dry as well as the battery tender that was under the bike. I have a '95 Harley Heritage with a windshield and I bought the extra-large cover. At first I thought that it was too big, but I changed my mind. It covers the bike all the way to the ground and the elastic bottom edge helps keep out water.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hartner

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing bargain!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing bargain!!! I live in San Francisco where it is foggy and damp for a large part of the year and need a waterproof cover that breathes. This cover is well built and I like that the seams are reflective material since I often have to park on the street. I've paid three times as much for lesser quality covers in the past. The sizing recommendations are spot on. I ordered the Medium for my CBR and it fit perfectly. I would highly recommend this cover to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Tait

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I barely gave 5 stars review unless its worth it. I bought this cover for our motorcycle and I think it's the best so far. I know some covers are thin but this one is best it's thick and covers the whole bike. We have an 2016 R6 and R3 and its amazing that it covers everything even the wheels and underneath the bike it's like wrapping the bike. Also it's waterproof. I would highly recommend this covers to everyone I know that has bike and to all the people that are looking for covers.
customer_reviews.author: Lora carmen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic love this cover
customer_reviews.text: This is unlike any cover I have purchased~ it’s a heavy material-~~ Appears it won’t disintegrate like the cheaper covers. Survived 2 of the seldom rain storms in sunny CA. It’s a little large and does not fit tightly on my 650 Suzuki like the pictures, which makes it easier to remove and put on(purchased the recommended large)nonetheless I think it’s a great cover.
customer_reviews.author: sdsun

customer_reviews.title: Terrible breathable design
customer_reviews.text: I had it hooked underneath my 2013 to make it secured. It caught wind and made my bike land on its side. That’s not breathable or efficient. Now I have damage to my motorcycle!!! Are you going to pay for my damages!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: fits perfect and works great
customer_reviews.text: love the fact that I don't have to wait till my bike cools down before tossing on the cover. my muffler hasn't burn through the cover like my pass ones did. love the carry bag. just toss it on my back and carry cover with me to work cover my bike and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: good price on a good cover
customer_reviews.text: The south Florida weather can be brutal on motorcycle covers. I am lucky to get a year and a half out of covers regardless of how much I paid or who makes them. Despite the crazy wind and rain we can get here the bikes stay well protected. The reflective piping is a nice touch, makes it really noticeable at night. The medium size is a good fit for my 250 Suzuki and 310r BMW. There is a little bit of fading from the sun but seems to be cosmetic. I’m on my third cover, the first two had the strap underneath clip on the left side, this last one has the clip on the right side.
customer_reviews.author: Oryx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover really well made and fits my cruiser like a glove. Stays on in high wind and protects the bike super well. I also love the reflective piping you can see it easily from a distance and I ordered the black one. I have a Kawasaki Vulcan and I wanted it to form fit so I ordered a medium and it's perfect with saddlebags and windshield as well. Folds and stores easily, light weight but very strong. I would recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best bike cover ever for my 2013 ninja 1000
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best bike cover ever for my 2013 ninja 1000. This cover has taken a beating and it still looks brand new and not a tear or rip on its and my bike is kept safe from all sorts of weather. I highly recommend getting this for your bike. Very durable material and it has adjustable strap to clip on the bottom so you can tighten it for windy days. It's a perfect fit my bike every square inch is covered. I am a happy customer and no I'm not a fake review either. 100% realreview.
customer_reviews.author: Avigon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality. If I had one complaint
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. If I had one complaint, it would be that the instructions say to look for Front and Back to determine which way to put it on, but on mine there is no such labeling. Other than that, this is an excellent product. I will update as needed over time.
customer_reviews.author: Jake B.

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it’s waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: In Atlanta it has rained more than Portland this year, but my 1985 Honda Elite 250 is as dry as can be. Nice that in this instance waterproof actually MEANS waterproof. Other brands, take note!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Good cover at great price
customer_reviews.text: This bike cover is high quality and covers my Harley-Davidson Ultra Limited with room to spare. Its price was less than half of a similar cover from H-D. I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy King

customer_reviews.title: There is a strap that runs underneath the bike that buckles so that it won't fly away in the wind (not sure it would anyway but was happy to see that feature)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the XXL for my HD Road King three weeks ago. It is a bit on the large side, I think I could have purchased the XL instead, but it fits and is working exactly as described. There is a strap that runs underneath the bike that buckles so that it won't fly away in the wind (not sure it would anyway but was happy to see that feature). Seems very durable and is keeping my bike dry and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra DeGaine

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover for HD!
customer_reviews.text: XL fits my 2016 HD Road Glide like a glove....Great Cover!
customer_reviews.author: Roy Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Bike is dry...
customer_reviews.text: after 3 major snow storms (Colorado), the cover has kept my machine clean and dry. works great. I have a 2003 Yamaha VStar with fairing and bags...fit's with a bit of room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: ace

customer_reviews.title: True waterproof. Heavy duty fabric.
customer_reviews.text: After a month of everyday use: best waterproof cover that I tried so far. I bought 3 covers before this one and all failed to deliver a positive experience. Cover that is truly waterproof is hard to find. Quality is immaculate.
customer_reviews.author: Andrey V. Zvonarev

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I had this cover for a little over a year and it fadded which is to be expected, but not long after developed a huge tear . I was hoping to get a bit more bang for my buck considering I paid close to $60 for the item. I've had cheaper covers last longer. Not as durable as advertised. Not sure what lifetime warranty means these days. Pretty much every body says that, but it really doesn't mean much.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Engels

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I've been through many heavy storms and winds in excess of 30mph with my truck blocking most of my bike and the cover has held up. It is in direct sunlight and water does bead on it. My bike that is covered does stay dry. My tires are exposed. I will revise my review should the product stop performing
customer_reviews.author: Katanajo

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Quality motorcycle cover and a good value for the money. Seems to be of good, quite heavy duty material. Could use a more than a single center buckle in windy conditions, but otherwise highly recommended for it use. I used the medium size for my Triumph Daytona and it fits well, maybe a little oversize for this bike, but should fit similar motorcycles in a similar manner. The elastic hem on the bottom does snag on things a bit at times, but once on the hem's proximity to the ground is welcomed and moderately snug.
customer_reviews.author: robertbmurphy

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, great customer service, but you wont need them.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great product. I have an GSXR 1000 and medium fit like a glove, perfect. Good strong material. Wraps nice around the bottom with the elastic band and clip strap. Dont hesitate to buy this if your looking for a cover for your bike. Update. Great customer service. They emailed me to see if I received the item and how i liked it out of the box. 3 weeks later they sent another email asking if i am fully satisfied with their product. I am absolutely impressed with the cover , so I dont but they were willing to make it right had I had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Will H

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a little while and I'm satisfied so far. The bottom is elastic and holds pretty well. I'll update this review if needed. 2014 Suzuki GSX-R1000. UPDATE: June 2018. This cover still works pretty well and keeps my bike safe from most elements. The color has faded a little bit, but it spends a lot of time in direct sunlight so I can understand that will probably happen over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent cover.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent cover.. kept bike clean and dry during torrential downpour. Great construction and quality. I ordered an XXL for my Indian Chieftain and believe it was the right size
customer_reviews.author: Wayne N Truitt

customer_reviews.title: This is a super nice cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a super nice cover. I have two. The large is great for a big sport touring machine and I have a medium which fits my dirt bike really well. Very thick material and great elastic around the bottom to hold it on. The black holds up to sun better than the blue but that is to be expected. I think this to be very similar to much, much more expensive covers and its worlds better than those $35.00 walmart specials.
customer_reviews.author: centralscrutinizer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Fit my bike perfectly, I have an Indian Springfield very pleased with product as described. Scotch guard will discolor the product. I would recommend this cover to others, it is a High quality product and worth the price. delivery was fast and customer service is very helpful in response to questions.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Quality and great detail with color (Camo)
customer_reviews.text: It’s wonderful. With the camo it blends right into my Jasmine bushes. Don’t even worry about it getting stolen and the cover is quality.
customer_reviews.author: FreeDrinks

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy, Fantastic Protection
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover! We've had downpour rain the past few weeks of spring, and every time I've gone out to check, the bike is still dry as a bone under the cover. It is just thick enough that it provides great protection, while still being able to roll up tightly and fit into a backpack with some other gear. Depending on your storage option it may be a bit bulky for a daily driver, but for those parking the majority of the week, it's a fantastic option.
customer_reviews.author: Darren McGee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Totally worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. This cover is pretty awesome! The bike stays completely dry. I live in Florida and if it's not 100 degrees out here, we have a storm every other day. Cover has been through it all and it's only been a couple of months. I know some people said their covers faded due to the hot sun but mine is intact. You can tell it's good quality just by looking at the material. Definitely worth buying. I initially was going to buy some cheap $19 cover but after reading reviews on this one i took a chance on it and I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: olliffer b.

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough for this cover.
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this bike cover. It's made of substantial material that doesn't feel cheap or flimsy. I ordered a large cover based on the measurements provided by the seller for my 09 dl650 that's equipped with a large aftermarket madstad windshield. The bike cover is tall enough to secure the entire bike. The highly reflective piping is a nice touch for when I have my bike covered in a parking lot at night.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Bullard

customer_reviews.title: " Best. Money
customer_reviews.text: Read other reviews and thought "let me give this a shot." Best. Money. Spent. Soon as I took it out of the box I felt like it was Christmas. The fabric seems luxurious compared to other covers I've had. I absolutely love it; it fits my Suzuki TL 1000R beautifully! Highly recommended. Exceeded my expectations. Will fit your sport bike. Worth the money. Would do business with again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Glover

product_meta.title: Premium Heavy Duty Outdoor Motorcycle Cover. Waterproof All Season Polyester w/Soft Screen Shield.Heat Resistant Lockable fabric that is Durable & Long Lasting. Fits Sportbikes & Cruisers (Lrg blk)
feature_bullets: SIZING CHART MEDIUM - (SPORTSBIKE) Fits lengths up to 90 inches long (Tire to Tire) and 50 inches high (Ground to Top of Windscreen) LARGE - (SPORT TOURING) Fits lengths up to 97 inches long (Tire to Tire) and 57 inches high (Ground to Top of Windscreen) XL - (LARGE COURIERS / TOURING) Fits lengths up to 104 inches long (Tire to Tire) and 56 inches high (Ground to Top of Windscreen) XXL - (HONDA GOLDWING / HARLEY DAVIDSON TOURING) Fits up to 108in and 60in high (Ground to Top of Windscreen)

REFLECTIVE STRIPS covers more visibility for parking cars to prevent bumping of motorcycle covers outdoor storage. INNOVATIVE motorcycle cover design icon on sprocket side of the motorcycle winter cover, so you never have to guess whether it was installed properly to cover bike. SOFT COTTON WINDSCREEN PROTECTOR - prevents scratching the windshield during installation.

HEAVY DUTY ELASTIC BOTTOM and LUGGAGE STRAP, cover to motorcycle, for an extremely snug fit to ensure your waterproof motorcycle cover remains covered during high winds. INTERIOR HEAT SHIELD - prevents burning and melting of cover due to HOT PIPES. Your motorcycle cover has a HEAT RATING OF 150 DEGREES.

LOCKABLE motorcycle covers has DURABLY SEWN CUTOUTS for chains, wire and cable locks to pass thru freely, protecting your HARLEY, SUZUKI, YAMAHA, DUCATI, BMW, KAWASAKI, HONDA Motorcycle cover. You’ll have peace of mind knowing that your cover motorcycle outdoor is safe and secure.

BREATHABLE MOTORCYCLE COVER waterproof air vents allows air to pass through preventing tip over from high winds. NUZARI'S product is an excellent fit for Motorcycle cover Harley Davidson and Cover for Motorcycle Harley
